column4: how would i edit the network interface just to get a connection? i cant even ping my own modem
nope, native install done on a secondary hdd

: so did i but it failed after a whilst and it was slow and i got sick of it
so i did a clean install on a blank hard drive, and if i can get the internet working again it will be great
what was the interface; wired or wireless

what is the chipset and what does ifconfig show, two entries or three
also are you hotplugging the ethernet or have it in on boot
its an eth0 connection with a loopback and thats all it has basically

what does the interface show up as ? eth0?
